entries.text: Yes, you read that right. The Perl Foundation will sponsor four newcomers's trip to YAPC::NA.

entries.text: Using a database interface without knowing how to profile it is like knowing how to eat, but without being acquainted to the concept of napkin -- you can only go so far before it becomes socially awkward.

header: Yup, a new release of Rakudo is out. No new features this time around, just some healthy, wholesome fixes and improvements. In other news, the Perl Foundation has a rather fantastic offer for four newcomers to Perl -- if you do fit that category, you should check that out. Happy Bunny Day! ~ `/anick
subject: Another Religious Holiday, Another Perl 6 Release...
